I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
I am not alive but I grow. I do not have lungs but I need air. What am I?
I have cities but no houses. I have mountains but no trees. I have water but no fish. What am I?
I am always hungry I must always be fed. The finger I lick will soon turn red. What am I?
I have a neck but no head. I have two arms but no hands. What am I?
I can be cracked made told and played. What am I?
I have an eye but cannot see. I am stronger and faster than any man alive. What am I?
I have legs but cannot walk. I have a seat but cannot sit. What am I?
I can be long or I can be short. I can be bought or I can be grown. What am I?
I go up but never come down. What am I?
I have a face but no eyes hands but no arms. I tell you things but cannot speak. What am I?
I am full of holes but I can still hold water. What am I?
I get wetter the more I dry. What am I?

I can run but not walk. I have a bed but cannot sleep. I have a mouth but cannot speak. What am I?

I have teeth but cannot bite. What am I?
I am so fragile that if you say my name I break. What am I?
The more you take the more you leave behind. What am I?
I have no life but I can die. What am I?
I have no voice but I tell stories. What am I?
I am always coming but never arrive. What am I?
I have a tongue but cannot speak. I have a soul but cannot feel. What am I?
I have a ring but no finger. What am I?
I have a heart but no other organs. What am I?
I have many teeth but cannot chew. What am I?
I am tall when I am young and I am short when I am old. What am I?
What turns everything around but does not move?

What cannot talk but will always reply when spoken to?
